text:
Champions League
Bar√ßa - Slavia Prague: which team for Valverde?
The Blaugrana are expected to turn out tonight for a C1 game, after a failed match at Levante.
05 Nov 2019, 10:00 by Thomas Rassouli



The surprise defeat of Bar√ßa this weekend has awakened old demons, and cast doubt on the future of Ernesto Valverde in Catalonia. Lacking results since the start of the season in La Liga, the Blaugrana are facing different controversies, including that surrounding Antoine Griezmann, one of the star recruits of the summer, having difficulty integrating into the group. Tonight in the Champions League, the opportunity is beautiful to revive.




For this confrontation, the great missing will be Luis Suarez, injured this weekend and therefore unavailable. Along with Antoine Griezmann and Lionel Messi, Ernesto Valverde should bet on the nugget Ansu Fati, despite the return of Ousmane Demb√©l√© in the group. In the middle, Arthur would give his place to Sergi Roberto, Semedo taking the right side of the defense.
Without Demb√©l√©, with Fati?




The probable composition of Bar√ßa +8 üì∑Credit Photo - Demivol√©e

For this confrontation, the great missing will be Luis Suarez, injured this weekend and therefore unavailable. Along with Antoine Griezmann and Lionel Messi, Ernesto Valverde should bet on the nugget Ansu Fati, despite the return of Ousmane Demb√©l√© in the group. In the middle, Arthur would give his place to Sergi Roberto, Semedo taking the right side of the defense.
